The state highway department will host a public meeting on June 18 to discuss a proposed project designed to improve the safety and traffic flow on U.S. 190 between Interstate 12 and the Claiborne Hill overpass near downtown Covington .

RelatedSentence: The project is designed to improve the safety and traffic flow on the major north - south commercial artery by restricting turning movements , closing some crossovers , changing traffic signals and adding signals at U-turns , according to the news release .
